data.lyric:
[ti:Ransom (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Tecca]
[al:Ransom]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Ransom (Explicit) - Lil Tecca
[00:02.25]Lyrics by：Tyler-Justin Anthony Sharpe
[00:04.51]Turn you to a dancer
[00:07.82]Yeah
[00:09.41]Internet Money b***h
[00:10.54]I got black I got white whatchu' you want
[00:12.96]Hop outside a Ghost and hop up in a Phantom
[00:15.35]I know I'm boutta blow-oh-whoa I ain't dumb
[00:17.98]They try to take my flow I take they a*s for ransom
[00:20.67]I know that I'm gone
[00:22.01]They see me blowin' up now they say they want some
[00:24.46]I got two twin Glocks turn you to a dancer
[00:27.15]I see two twin opps leave 'em on the banner
[00:29.90]And I got two thick thots wanna lick the gang yeah
[00:32.18]I got red I got blue whatchu' want
[00:34.22]The Chanel or Balenciaga Louis and Vuitton
[00:36.79]She know I got the Fendi Prada when I am alone
[00:39.52]I needed me a die or ride or I need me the one
[00:42.19]I started from the bottom you could see the way I stunt
[00:44.74]I want all the diamonds I want that s**t to weigh a ton
[00:47.45]The opps they tryna law me 'cause they hate the place I'm from
[00:50.22]But them n***as don't know me they just know the place I'm from
[00:52.78]I got lots of shawties tryna pull up to my place
[00:55.48]But you ain't want me last year so just get up out my face
[00:58.03]They all up in my inbox so I know they want a taste
[01:00.71]I know they want my downfall oh lil' n***a are you laced
[01:03.86]I got black I got white whatchu' you want
[01:06.39]Hop outside a Ghost and hop up in a Phantom
[01:08.83]I know I'm boutta blow-oh-whoa I ain't dumb
[01:11.41]They try to take my flow I take they a*s for ransom
[01:14.14]I know that I'm gone
[01:15.34]They see me blowin' up now they say they want some
[01:17.88]I got two twin Glocks turn you to a dancer
[01:20.56]I see two twin opps leave 'em on the banner
[01:23.16]And I got two thick thots wanna lick the gang yeah
[01:25.54]I got black I got white whatchu' you want
[01:27.60]Hop outside a Ghost and hop up in a Phantom
[01:30.11]I know I'm boutta blow-oh-whoa I ain't dumb
[01:32.75]They try to take my flow I take they a*s for ransom
[01:35.53]I know that I'm gone
[01:36.68]They see me blowin' up now they say they want some
[01:39.17]I got two twin Glocks turn you to a dancer
[01:41.88]I see two twin opps leave 'em on the banner
[01:44.41]And I got two thick thots wanna lick the gang yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Ransom (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Tecca]
[al:Ransom]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.25]//
[00:04.51]让你跳起舞来
[00:07.82]//
[00:09.41]Internet Money团队制作
[00:10.54]你想要什么 我应有尽有
[00:12.96]从劳斯莱斯古斯特出来 坐上劳斯莱斯幻影
[00:15.35]我知道我会大火 我又不是傻子
[00:17.98]他们想要抄袭我的音乐 结果被我反杀
[00:20.67]我知道我很厉害
[00:22.01]他们看我火了 现在他们也想火一把
[00:24.46]我有两把一模一样的格洛克手枪 让你跳起舞来
[00:27.15]我看到两个对手 他们束手无策
[00:29.90]我有两个丰满的妞 想要巴结咱们匪帮
[00:32.18]你想要什么 我应有尽有
[00:34.22]香奈儿 巴黎世家 路易威登
[00:36.79]她知道当我去米兰时 就会买Fendi和Prada
[00:39.52]我需要一个生死之交 我需要一个真爱
[00:42.19]我从底层爬起来 你看我现在多不一般
[00:44.74]我想要钻石 我想要大量的钻石
[00:47.45]对手想要制服我 因为他们讨厌我的家乡
[00:50.22]但他们根本不了解我 他们只知道我来自哪里
[00:52.78]好多美女想要来我家
[00:55.48]但去年你就瞧不起我 所以现在给我滚远点
[00:58.03]他们都给我发信息 所以我知道他们想要巴结我
[01:00.71]我知道有人盼着我倒下 小兄弟 你没事吧
[01:03.86]你想要什么 我应有尽有
[01:06.39]从劳斯莱斯古斯特出来 坐上劳斯莱斯幻影
[01:08.83]我知道我会大火 我又不是傻子

[01:23.16]我有两个丰满的妞 想要巴结咱们匪帮
